trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: As instâncias desta classe são transmitidas para <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler>.</xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Gets the server reply to a data upload operation started by calling an <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a resposta do servidor para uma operação de carregamento de dados iniciada ao chamar um <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync*>método.</xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync*>

trans-unit.source: You should check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> properties before using the data returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: Deve verificar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>propriedades antes de utilizar os dados devolvidos por esta propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property's value is an <xref:System.Exception> object or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the Result property's value will not be valid.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>valor da propriedade é um <xref:System.Exception>objeto ou a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>é o valor da propriedade `true`, a operação assíncrona não foi concluída corretamente e valor da propriedade resultado não será válido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array containing the server reply.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Byte>matriz que contém a resposta do servidor.</xref:System.Byte>
